thread.title: BRIEF-Mannkind Announces $28.0 Million Registered Direct Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mannkind Announces $28.0 Million Registered Direct Offering
text:
April 6, 2018 / 6:06 AM / in an hour BRIEF-Mannkind Announces $28.0 Million Registered Direct Offering Reuters Staff 
April 6 (Reuters) - MannKind Corp: 
* MANNKIND ANNOUNCES $28.0 MILLION REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING 
* ‍EACH SHARE OF STOCK BEING SOLD WITH WARRANT TO BUY 1 SHARE OF STOCK FOR COMBINED PURCHASE PRICE OF $2, RESULTING IN GROSS PROCEEDS OF $28.0 MILLION​ 
* ‍WARRANTS WILL BE EXERCISABLE AT A PRICE OF $2.38 PER SHARE BEGINNING SIX MONTHS FOLLOWING DATE OF ISSUANCE AND WILL EXPIRE SIX MONTHS THEREAFTER​ 
* ‍ANNOUNCED PRICING OF A REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING OF 14 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK AND WARRANTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
